titlestmt.titleproper: Burns, Eveline M. Collection of Publications 5441
titlestmt.author: Compiled by R. Miles

publicationstmt.publisher: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-08-26 00:15:22 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: Undetermined, Code for undetermined script script.

change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Eveline M. Burns Collection of Publications
did.abstract: Books on German, British, and Latin American labor and Social Security donated by Dr. Eveline M. Burns, emeritus professor of Columbia School of Social Work.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Eveline M. Burns Collection of Publications #5441. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5249: Henry R. Seager research notes and monographs 5336: Independent Labour Party (Great Britain) Pamphlets 5337: Labour Party (Great Britain) Pamphlets 5338: Trades Union Congress (Great Britain) Pamphlets

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/
